casebody.data:
WELLS FARGO BANK, N.A., Not in its Individual Capacity but Solely as Trustee FOR RMAC, PASS-THROUGH TRUST, SERIES 2010-A, Respondent,
v.
Robert SHATLES, Also Known as Robert L. Shatles, et al., Appellants, et al., Defendants. Court of Appeals of New York. Decided March 27, 2018

Appeal dismissed without costs, by the Court of Appeals, sua sponte, upon the ground that the order appealed from does not finally determine the action within the meaning of the Constitution.
